Pure, safe, open source, letting inspiration land instantly.

footer.disclaimerContent:
1. Tools For Reference Only
Tools on this site are for learning and reference only. No guarantee of accuracy or completeness. Tool outputs do not constitute professional advice.

2. Health & Finance Disclaimer
Results from health and finance tools are for reference only and do not constitute medical diagnoses, treatment recommendations, or investment advice. Please consult professionals for related needs.

3. User Responsibility
The site assumes no responsibility for any consequences of using these tools. Please verify tool suitability before use.

4. Data Security
The site is not responsible for data loss due to network or system failures. We recommend backing up important data before using tools.

5. Open Source Disclaimer
This project is released under an open source license. We are not liable for any issues arising from the use, modification, or distribution of the code.

6. Service Changes
The site reserves the right to modify, interrupt, or discontinue services without prior notice.

7. Contact
Contact powelabraham67@gmail.com for any issues.
